title: Papá Soltero
overview: Papá Soltero tells the story of César, who becomes the sole caretaker of a unique family after the sudden death of his wife Sandra. His new reality includes his teenage stepdaughter Ana, his daughter from a previous marriage María, and the twins he had with Sandra — Miguel and Cesarín. Now, César must figure out how to be a father to them while navigating and discovering other aspects of his life.
